
How does sersicn influence SNRs (megalut vs sextractor)?
For each sersicn, the size is adjusted so that adamom_sigma is roughly 1.8 pixels







zeropoint tru_mag tru_sersicn    snr_mean   sex_snr_auto_mean adamom_sigma_mean adamom_flux_mean    tru_flux   sewpy_FLUX_AUTO_mean skystampsum_mean
